website_summaries.verdict: Choose this pillow if you sleep on your side and want knee support that is likely to stay where you put it while you relax or sleep.
pros: Unique shape makes it suitable for side sleepers
Has a strap to keep it in place and a removable cover that's easy to clean
Memory foam construction contours to the shape of your knee
cons: The foam has been known to split apart over time
Has a strange odor that may fade with use

customer_reviews.title: Lower back pain, gone!
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this knee pillow a few days and thought why not try it, others products haven’t worked. It’s inexpensive enough that if it doesn’t there’s not much lost. I run, bike, and swim, so my back has been very achy and I have had difficulty sleeping on my side, which is my preferred position. So far it’s a definite improvement! Sleeping well and no pain. Weird to think a knee pillow would do that. The strap is an added bonus because it helps it stay in place. I recommend giving it a shot.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this knee pillow because I sleep on my side and one leg on my other leg feels heavy sometimes. I though this might relive the pressure and well let me just say it has. I’m not one to write many reviews but let me say that after a week of sleeping with it I feel more rested and my body feels more aligned. Best purchase on Amazon I have made!
customer_reviews.author: Karla L. Munoz

customer_reviews.title: Decreases pressure on your lower back and improves your sleep.
customer_reviews.text: I have not slept better in years. I feel well rested and my back doesn’t bother me anymore. Highly recommended and it comes with a travel bag so you can take it on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Knee pillow works great
customer_reviews.text: I received it 2 days ago and have used it both nights to sleep. I have back issues and have been advised to sleep with a pillow between my legs or knees. This works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Barbwirebabe

customer_reviews.title: Helps relieve back pain.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow hoping it would help my husband sleep better and wake up without his normal excruciating back pain. He has suffered from a herniated disk and arthritis of the spine for many years. He has now used this pillow for several weeks and what a difference! He is able to sleep through the night. He is dealing with many serious health problems, but this memory foam pillow has provided much relief at night. This was a great purchase that I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: C. Peters

customer_reviews.title: Average knee pillow
customer_reviews.text: I have never tried a knee pillow before so I have nothing to compare to, but the shake us not quite right for me. It’s possibly a little to think on the ends. My biggest complaint is that the strap is ver loose and there is no way to tighten it, so it falls off if I have to get up for any reason. It does do the job when I am sleeping on my side though so I am continuing to Usenet.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Split foam pillows
customer_reviews.text: Actually liked this product but when I went to wash the outer cover I discovered that the foam pillow inside was split in half. My husband’s was starting to split also. They weren’t like that when we got them because we checked them both for any imperfections of which we found none. Really disappointed because we did like the pillows.
customer_reviews.author: DIANE TUTEWOHL

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!  Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh, I love this pillow! Every night I was waking up with severe hip pain. I have tried physical therapy, chiropractor, you name it, I've tried it. I have been using this pillow for 3 nights and no pain whatsoever! It stays in place and is very comfortable. I am 73 and the doctor said that I have little clearance in two of my lower vertebrae and some arthritis too. I truly cannot believe how this one little pillow can make such a difference!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon A Machado

customer_reviews.title: Big Things Come in Little Packages
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband. He tells me he has not had back pain upon waking. He says the pillow is comfortable to use and I like the compact size that makes sleeping next to him more comfortable for me - no more bulky pillow to lie against.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Graham Stalik

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: It fits quite well. I thought it might be too thick but it’s not. It stays in place even without the strap but the strap positively secures it in place. It also is a great aid to my lower back debacle. I had back surgery many years ago. I was promised a normal life. Not! The pain in my lower back in the mornings hampers my ability to walk. This little pillow helps to keep my spine even while I am sleeping. I have less pain and I can walk without my cane in the mornings.
customer_reviews.author: charley erdman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product, beats a maternity pillow!
customer_reviews.text: I'm pregnant with extreme lower back pains, within 2 nights no more pain, no need to take tylenol, I wake up more comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Shari Brown

customer_reviews.title: To thin and small for good support
customer_reviews.text: This knee pillow was smaller and much thinner than it looked in the photo. I had lower back surgery 7 weeks ago and was looking for a knee pillow to keep my spine alined. I tried it 2 nights and I ended up in more pain in the morning, so very disappointed. I really wanted this to work as I liked the feature that keeps it in place on your leg. I guess it is back to a bulky pillow that I have to continually move as I change sides.
customer_reviews.author: S. Mayhew

customer_reviews.title: Great for frequent rollers!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a lifesaver. I used to use a different pillow between my knees but I roll over a lot, and hated the inconvenience of grabbing it and readjusting it. This is amazing for people who roll back and forth throughout the night!!
customer_reviews.author: CTmama

customer_reviews.title: Not able to use
customer_reviews.text: Strap was uncomfortable albeit necessary. Felt like pillow was too thin of a wedge.
customer_reviews.author: DIANE HART

customer_reviews.title: Purchase it! Best thing I’ve bought on amazon!
customer_reviews.text: I received this item yesterday, I used it last night and what a difference!!!!! I have a horrible hip/leg pain due to a martial arts injury and I felt ZERO pain throughout the night. I slept like a baby. I didn’t feel any back discomfort either. I love it! I’m buying one for my hubby and for my dad who has knee and back issues. I recommend 100%
customer_reviews.author: Christy C

customer_reviews.title: Fit and comfort
customer_reviews.text: The shape of this is perfect for placing over the knee, where you have a knee to knee contact when sleeping on your side.
customer_reviews.author: tgray

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: This product is overall practical and useful. I have had knee surgery and have always felt a discomfort but this product has helped with that. Plus its small and convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I used to have to use bulky pillows that get lost throughout the night and this pillow stay in place all night long relieving as much pain as possible! Thank you for helping me have a convenient good night’s sleep
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! Great Seller!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Really helped out! Seller was also very fast and friendly! 5 out 5 would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Best sleep ever
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how I ever slept without this. I love that it straps to my leg so I don’t lose it during sleep.
customer_reviews.author: BEG

customer_reviews.title: Pain Relief Fast
customer_reviews.text: I love this memory foam knee pillow! Ever since I have started using it my back pain has reduced tremendously. Highly recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nads

customer_reviews.title: Quality and value are very good
customer_reviews.text: The pillow is well made but it is to thick for me and I am 6'0 220lbs. But is you are a larger person this would be the perfect pillow for you. It is very thick and the material is very good, its just to large for me.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Dozier

customer_reviews.title: Side sleepers dream
customer_reviews.text: I am a side sleeper who used to need to take a sleeping pill to sleep comfortably. I have always needed to have a comforter between my legs in just the right way to sleep, and tossing and turning complicates that need. This pillow has fixed that and has given me the most restful sleep. Since using this pillow I no longer use sleep supplements.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It is comfortable and easy to use. I toss and turn most night but it stays in place
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Much more comfortable sleep.
customer_reviews.text: Product supports knees during sleep. Helps relieve hip pain. Not too bulky. Good support. Prompt delivery And great price.
customer_reviews.author: Saul F.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this after so many good reviews. Sadly, I did not have the same experience. It is far too hot, even in the winter months. But I continued to use it because I did find some mild relief when I did. Today, I washed it for the first time. The cover is ruined and I can’t use it till I figure out a new cover. I do not want the hot sticky foam sticking to my legs. I feel like one of the cheaper options would have sufficed.
customer_reviews.author: Lola Scala

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy - poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this pillow. I’ve only used it for a couple months and it’a fallen apart, inside foam part has broken apart, rendering it useless and there appears to be mold on the inner foam as well.
customer_reviews.author: Emily m.

customer_reviews.title: Painful on legs
customer_reviews.text: This knee pillow was NOT for me! It was very uncomfortable and gave me leg cramps. I quickly returned it for credit.
customer_reviews.author: Barb Flouro

customer_reviews.title: Perfect night sleep!!
customer_reviews.text: Hits the spot! Ever since I purchased this product I've had nothing but the best sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. It does get a little lose after a few days of usage. Now I can’t sleep without it.
customer_reviews.author: scott johnson

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Yes, does my hips good by allowing me to put this pillow between my knees <3
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Goode

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Sleeping better than ever with this leg pillow. I’m told I’ve been snoring less, too!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: I bought for post partum hip pain. I'm too much of a side/stomach sleeper. It works when I start off wearing it, but then I always manage to take it off or it slips down during the night.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Stogner

customer_reviews.title: Better than a pillow
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a week now and really like it. It stays in place far better that a pillow, particularly when you switch sides as much as I do over the course of a night.
customer_reviews.author: Kemi

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My husband adjusted to it quite well. He says he really likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Carolynn Jenson

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: It has eliminated the hip pain when I lay on my side! It may be a little too constricting on your leg but not too tight, something to get used to. But it has helped! Quick delivery too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must try!
customer_reviews.text: My preference would be a ‘cooler’ fabric option. This is great and instantly brought much needed support.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie U.

customer_reviews.title: Best pillow for back alignment!!
customer_reviews.text: Finally found a pillow that decreases my back pain! Very comfortable and stays in place!!
customer_reviews.author: nancy t

customer_reviews.title: To small for me
customer_reviews.text: This pillow was far to small for me. I'm a 6'0 heavy set male and this thing was tiny. It would work for a small person, but not for me. Good concept, but needs to be made in a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift so I haven't used it myself but it looks like it is a good quality and I like the strap on it for easy movement.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: great for back pain
customer_reviews.text: Nice and thick..very comfortable. Love the strap keeps in place all night. After the first use noticed my back pain was already better.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Brown

customer_reviews.title: LIFE CHANGER
customer_reviews.text: Literally changed my life! I have been sleeping so good.
customer_reviews.author: Heather A. Butler

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Best investment ever! Works great and super easy to sleep with, not bulky like I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: EDes

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: I felt this did not help any better than a regular pillow I used. Not really happy with it. I am disappointed. Was hoping for relief.
customer_reviews.author: KA

customer_reviews.title: relieves pain!
customer_reviews.text: quick delivery Helpful in relieving nerve pain from hip down leg.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Bianco

customer_reviews.title: Just was not for me.
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for me. But I am not saying it would not be perfect for others
customer_reviews.author: Mose24

customer_reviews.title: Magic
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable amd the strap comes in handy very much!
customer_reviews.author: Martin Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Comes with a strap to keep in place
customer_reviews.text: The strap so it does not move when you turn to your other side...
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Klein

customer_reviews.title: Can sleep the entire night with this pillow!
customer_reviews.text: I love this knee pillow. The shape is the most ergonomic one out there. Other pillows are too big and I end up tossing them aside midway through my sleep, but this one is the perfect size. You have to just trust me and buy it. If you don't like it, you can always return it, but I've tried at least three and this was the best!
customer_reviews.author: S. Ismail

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is really well designed and comfortable. I've been through a lot of knee pillows and this one is perfect for me. The strap is comfy and I am able to flop from side-to-side without waking up. The only issue is that the inner foam pillow has already cracked in half. Boo. But the good news? The manufacturer refunded my purchase when I asked about attaining a new foam insert. Now that is customer service! I will purchase a new pillow with the refund. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Odd shape makes it unusable for most
customer_reviews.text: Take a close look at the woman sleeping with this knee pillow. Her thigh and calf are almost fully bent, forming a tight, 45-degree angle. If you sleep like this, you're all set. If, however, you sleep with your legs not fully bent -- say, at 60 to 90 degree angle -- this pillow will not work. It's very firm and and contoured. I've tried to for a week, but it's not even close to accommodating my natural leg angle as a side sleeper.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser

customer_reviews.title: Saves my pregnant hips and back!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is amazing! I’m pregnant and sharing a small bed, so I needed something that doesn’t take up a lot of space. It’s still almost a little too big for me - I’m short and I have to adjust it just right or it feels weird. One kind of silly gripe is the color - I can’t find it against my black quilt or grey carpet in the dark. Given the option, I would have ordered a lighter color for contrast. Overall I’m really liking it!
customer_reviews.author: Bec Hutch

customer_reviews.title: Good for restless leg.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my daughter. She has lower back issues and restless leg when trying to sleep. She really likes it but doesn’t use the strap to attach to ones leg. She says it caused her to trip and fall once when she had to get up and potty and forgot it was attached to her. Even though it was funny and didn’t hurt herself, she did make quick not not to attach it again.
customer_reviews.author: Chet S.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I don’t use it as much as I thought I would. The strap is an awesome idea as I used it a few times without it and it would end up anywhere but between my legs! I should start using it more as I like how it keeps my spine in alignment.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this
customer_reviews.text: Love the way the grooves help align the fit. I enjoy sleeping on my side, but my knees ached because of the way they laid on top of one another. This is the perfect solution.
customer_reviews.author: Carla D.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pillow
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this. It stays in place and keeps his spine aligned.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Mack

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Comfortable design.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable design. Elastic band prevents pillow from getting lost overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Baumberger

customer_reviews.title: Soft surface and forms to body
customer_reviews.text: This is second pillow I’ve purchased. Very comforting. Size us perfect. Nice balance of firmness and conformity.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie R. Spaulding

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 10 in women's pants... keep that in mind because a few sizes bigger and the elastic would be too small to fit around my thigh. The pillow is very comfortable, the memory foam compresses and holds up very well.
customer_reviews.author: MonPetitChou

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable, but....
customer_reviews.text: I loved this thing!!! But it only lasted 2 months. Same issue as others have reported - the thinnest part separates and gives away. If it would’ve lasted 6 months, I would’ve given it 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Johnica

customer_reviews.title: Instead of using a big pillow, this products it’s small and shaped to rest your knew comfortably
customer_reviews.text: I use it when I am lying down between my legs to help me with my sciatica nerve, back pain, hip pain. It is helping me
customer_reviews.author: Juanita Norori

customer_reviews.title: Needs adjustable band.
customer_reviews.text: Really needs to have an adjustable strap. The band is too tight for even mildly plus size thighs.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Heaven at night for my bony knees
customer_reviews.text: I use this pillow almost every single night. My knees used to be so sore in the morning but this makes my side-sleeping feel like heaven again. Love that the strap keeps it in place throughout the night.
customer_reviews.author: NolanVoid

product_meta.title: TULARIS Memory Foam Knee Pillow for Side Sleepers - Between The Knees/Side Sleeping Pillow for Sciatica, Lower Back Pain Relief, and Knee Pain - Leg Strap Keeps Pillow Between Legs When Sleeping
feature_bullets: SCIATICA, BACK & HIP PAIN RELIEF – Orthopedic knee support pillow relieves pressure so you feel much more rested.
RECOMMENDED BY DOCTORS – The perfect knee pillow for side sleepers, lower back pain, knee pain, hip support, and during pregnancy.
STAY-ON TECHNOLOGY – Leg strap secures your knee pillow between legs for sleeping and helps align your legs, hips, and spine.
PREMIUM MEMORY FOAM – Molds to your body and maintains shape, unlike other pillows that flatten out.
REST ASSURED – We guarantee you'll love the pillow, and if you aren't absolutely satisfied, return it within 60 days for a refund, no questions asked. You also get a 1-year warranty!
